text: JÃ³n DaÃ°i BÃ¶Ã°varsson (born 25 May 1992 in Selfoss, Iceland) is an Icelandic footballer who currently plays for Bolton Wanderers as a right winger. He previously played for UMF Selfoss and Viking FK.
